Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Ziv-aflibercept is approved to be used with FOLFIRI to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Colorectal cancer that has metastasized (spread to other parts of the body). It is used in patients whose disease has not gotten better with other chemotherapy.

Section.Para: Ziv-aflibercept is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
